original: @35b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @35b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: aa ti yo ga bh'a ba na n'a ma /
analyzed: aa ti yo ga bh'a ba na n'a ma /
translated: Atyayoga-bhavana-nama

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: aa ti rnal 'byor gyi sgom pa'i thabs zhes bya ba /
analyzed: aa ti rnal 'byor gyi sgom pa'i thabs zhes bya ba /
translated: Atyayoga-yoga-bhavana-upaya-nama

original: 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble Manjushri.

original: dur khrod brgyad la 'jigs byed brgyad //
analyzed: dur khrod brgyad la 'jigs byed brgyad //
translated: In the eight charnel grounds, the eight fearsome ones,

original: dus mtha'i me 'bar khams gsum bsreg / tshangs pa'i go nas du ba 'thul //
analyzed: dus mtha'i me 'bar khams gsum bsreg / tshangs pa'i go nas du ba 'thul //
translated: The fire of the end times blazes, burning the three realms, smoke billows from the realm of Brahma,

original: rgya mtsho bskam shing padma 'bar //
analyzed: rgya mtsho bskam shing padma 'bar //
translated: The oceans dry up, and lotuses blaze.

original: rdo rje ze 'bru'i dbus su ni //
analyzed: rdo rje ze 'bru'i dbus su ni //
translated: In the center of the vajra pistil,

original: nyi ma'i gdan steng gnas pa de //
analyzed: nyi ma'i gdan steng gnas pa de //
translated: Residing on a sun seat,

original: nam mkha'i 'od chen h'um nyid sgrogs //
analyzed: nam mkha'i 'od chen h'um nyid sgrogs //
translated: The great light of space, resounding with the sound of hum,

original: mdzes pa'i sems nyid rgyu ba yin //üîΩrus sbal 'then cing sgra skad 'byung //
analyzed: mdzes pa'i sems nyid rgyu ba yin // rus sbal 'then cing sgra skad 'byung //
translated: Is the beautiful mind itself in motion.üîΩPulling the tortoise, sound arises.

original: ri bong can gyis mdud pa bkrol //
analyzed: ri bong can gyis mdud pa bkrol //
translated: The rabbit unties the knot.

original: nyams myong dpa' bo rang rig rgyal //
analyzed: nyams myong dpa' bo rang rig rgyal //
translated: The hero of experience, self-awareness, the victor,

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i bdag / mgon po nyid ni bsam par gyis //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i bdag / mgon po nyid ni bsam par gyis //
translated: The innate lord, the protector himself, should be contemplated.

original: de nyid snying rje'i dkyil 'khor 'phro //
analyzed: de nyid snying rje'i dkyil 'khor 'phro //
translated: That very [mind] radiates the mandala of compassion.

original: de nyid dur khrod me yin ta //
analyzed: de nyid dur khrod me yin ta //
translated: That very [mind] is the fire of the charnel ground.

original: de nyid smra dang zla rgyan 'dzag / skye rga shi dang khams gsum gnas //
analyzed: de nyid smra dang zla rgyan 'dzag / skye rga shi dang khams gsum gnas //
translated: That is said to be the moon ornament of the mouth, the dripping of the moon, birth, old age, death, and the abode of the three realms.

original: rang nyid dran te de nyid mthong //
analyzed: rang nyid dran te de nyid mthong //
translated: Remembering oneself, one sees thatness.

original: 'di ni gnyis med dbyibs dang bral //
analyzed: 'di ni gnyis med dbyibs dang bral //
translated: This is nondual, free from shape.

original: dngos po'i cho 'phrul brdzun pa ste //
analyzed: dngos po'i cho 'phrul brdzun pa ste //
translated: The magic display of entities is false,

original: sems nyid 'khrul pas ma rtogs so //
analyzed: sems nyid 'khrul pas ma rtogs so //
translated: not realized due to the delusion of the mind itself.

original: aa ti'i rnal 'byor rig pa med //
analyzed: aa ti'i rnal 'byor rig pa med //
translated: The yoga of ati is not awareness.

original: ji ltar bzhag pa de ltar yin //
analyzed: ji ltar bzhag pa de ltar yin //
translated: It is as it is placed.üîΩThe nondual mind is not always seen

original: gnyis med sems la rtag lta dang // chad par 'gyur ba 'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: gnyis med sems la rtag lta dang // chad par 'gyur ba 'ang ma yin no //
translated: and does not become nihilistic.

original: de phyir nyi zla'i dbus su ni //
analyzed: de phyir nyi zla'i dbus su ni //
translated: Therefore, in the center of the sun and moon,

original: phra ba'i h'um nyid bsgom par gyis //üîΩaa ti rnal 'byor gyi bsgom po'i man ngag ces bya ba slob dpon klu'i @36a * //
analyzed: phra ba'i h'um nyid bsgom par gyis // aa ti rnal 'byor gyi bsgom po'i man ngag ces bya ba slob dpon klu'i @36a * //
translated: meditate on the subtle h≈´·πÉ.

original: byang chub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: byang chub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The esoteric instruction of the meditation of the yoga of ati composed by ƒÄcƒÅrya NƒÅgabodhi is complete.
